title: Kreatif Kuliner
description: An interactive food recipe blog website that allows users to create, edit, delete, and read recipes. title: Narima Website
description: A company profile website for a digital agency that showcases its services, portfolio, and client testimonials. Built using Next.js and Material UI. I act as a web developer with the Narima team, focusing on feature development and performance optimization to improve user experience.

title: Gen8 Website
description: Information and branding website for a youth community platform featuring inspirational programs and events. Built using Laravel and Tailwind CSS. I act as a web developer in the Narima team, focusing on UI implementation, content integration, and cross-device display optimization.

title: Trustee
